SELECT A.ATTA_KEY, A.ATTA_LOCATION, A.ATTA_FILENAME, A.ATTA_FILEPATH, B_KEY, B_DATE, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_WRITER_FK, E_NAME FROM ATTACHMENT A JOIN BOARD B ON (A.ATTA_LOCATION = B.B_KEY) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (B.B_WRITER_FK = E.E_KEY) WHERE A.ATTA_KEY = #{attaKey} AND B.B_CATEGORY = 4
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ATTA_FILENAME = #{attaFileName} WHERE ATTA_KEY = #{attaKey}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ATTA_KEY, A.ATTA_LOCATION, A.ATTA_FILENAME, A.ATTA_FILEPATH, B_KEY, B_DATE, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_WRITER_FK, E_NAME, B_KEY FROM ATTACHMENT A JOIN BOARD B ON (A.ATTA_LOCATION = B.B_KEY) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (B.B_WRITER_FK = E.E_KEY) WHERE A.ATTA_KEY = #{attaKey} AND B.B_CATEGORY = 4

SELECT ATTA_KEY, ATTA_LOCATION, ATTA_FILENAME, ATTA_FILEPATH, B_TITLE, E_NAME, B_DATE FROM (SELECT A.ATTA_KEY, A.ATTA_LOCATION, A.ATTA_FILENAME, A.ATTA_FILEPATH, B_KEY, B_DATE, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, B_WRITER_FK, E_NAME, B_KEY FROM ATTACHMENT A JOIN BOARD B ON (A.ATTA_LOCATION = B.B_KEY) JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (B.B_WRITER_FK = E.E_KEY) WHERE B.B_CATEGORY = 4 ORDER BY B_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 7
